Literature.Title: Xylapeptide A, an Antibacterial Cyclopentapeptide with an Uncommon L-Pipecolinic Acid Moiety from the Associated Fungus Xylaria sp. (GDG-102).
Literature.Author: Xu WF, Hou XM, Yao FH, Zheng N, Li J, Wang CY, Yang RY, Shao CL

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Bacillus cereus(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Bacillus megaterium(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Shigella sp.(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Human colon adenocarcinoma HCT 116(no activity data),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(no activity data),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(no activity data),Human pancreatic adenocarcinoma BxPC-3(no activity data),Human myelogenous leukemia K562(no activity data),Human cytomegalovirus (HCMV)(no activity data),HSV-1(no activity data)
